representation_information.name: Microsoft Outlook 97-2002 Personal Folders File (ANSI)
representation_information.description: PST_ANSI is an ANSI character set-based data file used by Microsoft Office Outlook 97-2002 to store email messages, calendar events and other items on a local computer. It was replaced by PST_Unicode starting with Office Outlook 2003.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
